posts.text:
Jamm ég var að downloada autodata

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5168...5BMultiLang%5D

Ég er ekki allveg að skilja hvernig maður crakar hann :S hefur einhver sótt þetta forrit og crakað það með árangri? ef svo er má allveg leiðbeina mér

INSTALLATION
1. Unpack
2. Install file of image ( Daemoon Tools, alcohol )
3. Install, do not start up aplication!
4. Copy file abcd.dll for catalog C:ADCDA2
5. Start up file ad_inst from catalog CRACK.
6 Drive in driver install.
7 Moments in (to) wait appear data < give > ID REQUEST and copy it
8. Start up keygena, insert above-mentioned value and drive in generate.
9. Copy ID ANSWER and insert to proper field (tail) in program _ ad inst.
10 Click activate.
11 Be glad (please) completely functional version.
marg buinn að reyna þetta og þetta virkar ekki

Þessi útgáfa á að virka 

http://isohunt.com/torrent_details/1...ta?tab=summary


1. Mounted image "AutoData324.iso" with Daemon Tools 

2. install the Autodata accessing the file "install.exe" 

3. After installing the program, copy all files from folder "crack" in the image on partition C in the folder "ABCD" 

    - Warning: Do not copy the folder "crack", but all the files in it, except for 2 folders, "Cracked abcd.dll" and working key 3.24
    - Partition can be C or D, or depends on what path you've chosen to install. 

4. After you have copied all files listed in step 4, open the "ad_inst.exe" from folder "ABCD" 

    - Click on "Install Driver" and wait a moment to install the driver that simulates DONG (if windows ask you if you sure - allow the driver to be install)
	 (don't worry if you get an error) 
    - copy code "ID Request" and put it in the Keygen (opet it "Autodata_Keygen.exe")
    - Generate an activation code and return in the "AD Install ..."
    - Paste the code in place of writing "ID answer" and click on the "Activate" 

5. After activation copy file "abcd.dll" folder "Cracked abcd.dll" over the existing folder where you installed the program. 

6. Open the Desktop Autodata CD3 and enjoy this program. 

NOTE: If you have error message when you open the program it means that you have not installed Microsoft. NET Framework 3.5 SP1 
       - No problem, install the Microsoft. NET Framework v3.5 SP1
       - Restart your computer, then open the program Autodata v3.24

ef þú lest commentin undir download linknum þá sérðu að það eru ekki margir sem fá þetta til að virka
 - ég gerði þetta einhverntíman fyrir 2005/6/7 útgáfurnar og þær virka fínnt
Hvað í helvítinu er þetta Auto Data ? <<<shy.gif>>>
með þetta sem að ég náði í?
Settu klukkuna í tölvunni aftur til 2005 og þá virkar þetta,
